alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 10:35AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and northern Taylor Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1035 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles west of Perry to 15 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Secotan, Boyd, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Econfina, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Hampton Springs and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor
